es.ucm.fdi.tp.base.console

Class ConsolePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.base.console.ConsolePlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GamePlayer

    public class ConsolePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GamePlayer
    A console player. Can play any game, and offers console users a list of valid actions to choose from.
